summary: Phase 5 - Performance & UI Polish testing completed. All backend tests passed (12/12). Frontend testing verified Ended Matches tab, skeleton loading, CSS animations, view toggle, and regression tests for Messages, Friends, Notifications, and Settings pages.

backend: Ended matches response contains matches array with total count
All ended matches have FINISHED status
Ended matches have proper score data (home, away integers)
Ended matches include team information (id, name, crest)
Ended matches within reasonable 24-48h window (date-based filter)
Ended matches sorted by most recent first
frontend: HomePage: Clicking Ended tab shows recently finished matches
HomePage: Clock icon + 'Recently Finished' header visible
HomePage: Match count '(10 matches in last 24h)' displayed
HomePage: 10 ended match cards with FT status and scores
HomePage: Ended matches show 'Match has ended' banner
HomePage: Skeleton loading animation shows on fresh page load
HomePage: Grid view toggle works (match-view-grid class applied)
HomePage: List view toggle works (match-view-list class applied)
HomePage: Tab switching triggers filter-fade-in animation
HomePage: League filter change triggers filter animation
Profile page: All sections load correctly (header, stats, activity, favorites, friends, achievements, performance)
Profile page: Skeleton available during initial load
Regression: Messages page loads correctly with conversation list
Regression: Friends page loads with Message button on friend cards
Regression: Settings page loads with Online Visibility toggle

seed_data_creation: Using existing test users from Phase 4
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 5 Performance & UI Polish fully tested. Key features: 1) Ended Matches tab (data-testid='tab-ended') shows FINISHED matches from last 24h with scores, 'Recently Finished' header with clock icon, and match count. 2) Skeleton loading animation (.match-skeleton class with skeleton-shimmer) shows during initial data fetch. 3) Grid/List view toggle persists to localStorage and switches CSS classes (.match-view-grid, .match-view-list). 4) Filter animations use .match-list-animate-in class with filter-fade-in keyframes. 5) Profile page has optimized parallel data loading with skeleton state.

phase_5_feature_summary.ended_matches_tab: Implemented and working - shows 10 FINISHED matches from last 24h with Clock icon, 'Recently Finished' header, match count, FT status, and final scores
phase_5_feature_summary.skeleton_loading: Implemented and working - .match-skeleton class with skeleton-shimmer animation visible on fresh load
phase_5_feature_summary.view_mode_toggle: Implemented and working - Grid/List toggle applies .match-view-grid/.match-view-list CSS classes, persists to localStorage
phase_5_feature_summary.filter_animations: Implemented and working - .match-list-animate-in class with filter-fade-in keyframes on tab/league change
phase_5_feature_summary.profile_optimization: Implemented and working - parallel data fetching with skeleton state, all sections rendering correctly
phase_5_feature_summary.card_appear_animation: Implemented - card-appear keyframes for staggered card entry animation
phase_5_feature_summary.backend_ended_endpoint: GET /api/football/matches/ended returns FINISHED matches sorted by most recent first

css_animations_verified: skeleton-shimmer: background shimmer effect for loading state
card-appear: fade-in + scale + translateY for card entry
filter-fade-in: opacity + translateY for filter/tab transitions
